name: ListGithubDeployments
description:
Retrieve deployments from a GitHub repository.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of deployments for a specific GitHub repository, with filtering options available through query parameters.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: commit_sha
parameters.description: The commit SHA recorded at deployment creation time for filtering deployments.

value_schema.description: The SHA recorded at creation time.

parameters.name: repository_ref
parameters.description: The name of the ref. This can be a branch, tag, or SHA to filter deployments by.

value_schema.description: The name of the ref. This can be a branch, tag, or SHA.

parameters.name: deployment_task_name
parameters.description: The specific task name for the deployment, like `deploy` or `deploy:migrations`.

value_schema.description: The name of the task for the deployment (e.g., `deploy` or `deploy:migrations`).

parameters.name: deployment_environment
parameters.description: Specify the environment that was deployed to, such as 'staging' or 'production'.

value_schema.description: The name of the environment that was deployed to (e.g., `staging` or `production`).

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specifies which page of deployment results to fetch. Used for pagination to navigate through multiple pages of results.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: The SHA recorded at creation time.

value_schema.description: The SHA recorded at creation time.

parameters.name: ref
parameters.description: The name of the ref. This can be a branch, tag, or SHA.

value_schema.description: The name of the ref. This can be a branch, tag, or SHA.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: The name of the task for the deployment (e.g., `deploy` or `deploy:migrations`).

value_schema.description: The name of the task for the deployment (e.g., `deploy` or `deploy:migrations`).

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: The name of the environment that was deployed to (e.g., `staging` or `production`).

value_schema.description: The name of the environment that was deployed to (e.g., `staging` or `production`).

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
